archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1098
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer if i buy/get a reward i want to be able to 'share on social media' from app or web, so that I can tell friends and family about the great deal I got

properties.value: [CCM]Sharing partial content of e-mail over social media? [CLM] Rewards visible in SC which social media? facebook, something else? We have experience with facebook integration in SC without AIF invlolvement

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
